DESCRIPTION: Gains #b15% of your max HP as #yBlock, set your base [E] to #b1. NL Effects that add [E] will still applies.
Gains #yStrength by #b2 when taking attack damage.
Deals #b30 damage at the end of your turn after #b3 turns.
Gains #b3 #yStrength and Lose #b3 #yDexterity if any of the enemies does not intent to attack.
Activates when at or under #b50% of your max HP. When taking unblocked damage, #ySummon a #bSlime #bMinion to help you.
When total unblocked damage exceed the threshold, Gains #b12 #yThorns.
Damage is calculated by #b(H+1) multiply by #b3 damage where #bH is half of the monster's current HP divided by #b12 (rounded down).
Gains #b15 gold for each unblock damage dealt.
A relic inspired by the #bSlimeBoss in the #bDownfall mod.
